attributes.action: Bring back London Underground Ticket Offices
attributes.background: TFL closed down all ticket offices a crosss the network. General public are complaining in lack support available and the staff not having the right tools to solve customers issues. Ticket machines are not reliable, public would prefer having a ticket office.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
